extracted_sections.section_title: What’s the best way to create a PDF?
What’s the best way to create a PDF? (1)
Create PDFs by printing to file

subsection_analysis.refined_text: You can choose to either select the users to assign or create product profiles and assign users to the profiles. You can manage the deployment of Acrobat AI Assistant through the Adobe Admin Console. For more information, see Packaging apps via the Admin Console

You can create PDFs from documents printed on paper, Microsoft Word documents, InDesign® files, digital images, and more. Diﬀerent types of sources have diﬀerent tools available for PDF conversion. In many applications, you can create PDFs by selecting the Adobe PDF printer in the Print dialog box

For example, you can drag files to the Acrobat icon to create PDFs.. Every PDF balances eﬃciency (small file size) and quality (such as resolution and color). If the balance between the file size and the quality is critical to your task, you must use an appropriate conversion method

Your source document is converted to PostScript and fed directly to Distiller for conversion to PDF, without manually starting Distiller. The current Distiller preference settings and Adobe PDF settings are used to convert the file. If you’re working with nonstandard page sizes, create a custom page size

For example, you cannot create bookmarks and hyperlinks using the Adobe PDF printer. A tagged structure is required for reflowing content to a handheld device and is preferable for producing reliable results with a screen reader. If you’re creating a PDF from a Microsoft Office document and you want to use these features, use PDFMaker
